question.string: How much was spent on public safety by the Town of Cary in 2010?

query.sparql: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_expenditures> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_expenditures. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Class <https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Class/4>. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2010). }

question.string: How many programs were done under the class of General Government in the expenditure of the Town of Cary?

query.sparql: select count(distinct(?program)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_expenditures> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_expenditures. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Program ?program. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_expenditures-Class <https://openspending.org/town_of_cary_expenditures/Class/3>. }

question.string: How much did the Town of Cary earn in 2010?

query.sparql: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_revenues> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_revenues. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2010). ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-amount ?amount. }

question.string: Which class achieved the highest revenue for the Town of Cary?

query.sparql: select ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/town_of_cary_revenues> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:town_of_cary_revenues. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-Class ?result. ?obs lso:town_of_cary_revenues-amount ?amount. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: For which account type of whiteacre was spent the most?

query.sparql: select ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-whiteacre-spending. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-accounttype ?result. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-amount ?amount. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: How much interest did the debt service of the city of Whiteacre spend?

query.sparql: select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-whiteacre-spending. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-object <https://openspending.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending/object/9022.0>. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-to <https://openspending.org/city-of-whiteacre-spending/to/851006>. ?obs lso:city-of-whiteacre-spending-amount ?amount. }

question.string: Which expenses had the highest total amount of proposed expenditures for the Maldives?

query.sparql: select ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-Expenses ?result. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-amount ?amount. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: What was the highest single expenditure amount proposed by the Maldives Broadcasting Corporation?

query.sparql: select max(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-Agency <https://openspending.org/maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015/Agency/maldives-broadcasting-corporation>. ?obs lso:maldives_proposed_expenditure_2015-amount ?amount. }

question.string: Which Ugandan output had the highest budget in 2014?

query.sparql: select ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ministry_of_health> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:ministry_of_health. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-output ?result. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2014). } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: What was the average Uganda health budget amount in Namutumba District?

query.sparql: select avg(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ministry_of_health> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:ministry_of_health. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-to <https://openspending.org/ministry_of_health/to/namutumba-district>. ?obs lso:ministry_of_health-amount ?amount. }

question.string: How many suppliers did the Newcastle city council use for education?

query.sparql: select count(distinct(?supplier)) as ?result from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/newcastle-city-council-payments-over-500> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:newcastle-city-council-payments-over-500. ?obs lso:newcastle-city-council-payments-over-500-service-area "EDUCATION". ?obs lso:newcastle-city-council-payments-over-500-to ?supplier. }

question.string: On the Waltham Forest Council, how much money was given to the Forest Recycling Project?

question.string: Which departments of the city of Springfield had a higher budget in 2004 then in 2005?

query.sparql: select ?dep { select ?dep sum(xsd:decimal(?amount4)) as ?sum4 sum(xsd:decimal(?amount5)) as ?sum5 from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-springfield-budget> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-springfield-budget. ?obs lso:city-of-springfield-budget-to ?dep. { ?obs lso:city-of-springfield-budget-amount ?amount4. ?obs lso:refYear ?year4. filter(year(?year4)=2004). } union { ?obs lso:city-of-springfield-budget-amount ?amount5. ?obs lso:refYear ?year5. filter(year(?year5)=2005). } } } group by ?dep having(?sum4>?sum5)

question.string: What is the highest single budget amount in the city of Springfield for public safety?

query.sparql: select max(xsd:decimal(?amount)) from <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/city-of-springfield-budget> { ?obs qb:dataSet ls:city-of-springfield-budget. ?obs lso:city-of-springfield-budget-deptgroup <https://openspending.org/city-of-springfield-budget/deptgroup/public-safety>. ?obs lso:city-of-springfield-budget-amount ?amount. }
